Package com.sneakyrocket.pocketrocket.v1.core.response

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CatastrophicFailure  
    Done
    Denotes the end of a connection, so closes the connection.
    Failure
    When an issue occurs on the server, shows the message to the user as a toast.
    Hello
    Denotes the port number to use for the remainder of the session.
    InvalidCommand  
    OkText
    Provides output to a BufferedReader.
    Response  
    ResponseHandler
    Reads the connection to determine the appropriate response, then creates the response after parsing its arguments.
    Success
    For when the server responds that some action completed sucessfully.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ResponseFailureException
    Thrown any time a response fails, usually when it cannot be parsed correctly or an I/O error occurs.
